This also occurs in the simpler use case of just creating a new URL test 
launch configuration.  I have only one machine with the client side of Hyades 
installed right now, so I'm not sure if my workspace is corrupt somehow or if 
this is a true defect.

I cannot reproduce the problem using the latest code from HEAD.
The problem seams to be a missing icon somwhere on the launch configuration 
wizard ( or icons not loaded ).

To be able to debug the problem I need more information :
- what perspective were you in 
- were you using the Run > Hyades URL test configuration ( or the Profile > 
Hyades URL test ) ?

I must have been in some type of strange state, I am pretty sure I was in 
the "Test Navigator" perspective and almost certain I was using the Run > 
Hyades URL Test launch configuration.

Upon attempt of reproducing defect today, I was unable.  I apologize for the 
inconvenience.  I will reopen if I stumble upon the exact steps again; I have 
not cleared my workspace since this defect was reported, the only thing I did 
was restart my environment since then (Eclipse, etc).
Please reopen the defect if you can reproduce the problem
